description: Grilled cheese, meatball and salad rolls, yum! This is an easy meatball sub recipe that's ready in just 15 minutes. Perfect for a quick, tasty dinner.
name: Easy Meatballs Subs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fanforced. Heat oil in a large frying pan on medium heat. Cook meatballs, turning occasionally, for 8 minutes or until browned and cooked through.

Meanwhile, split rolls lengthways down centre, being careful not to cut all the way through. Open rolls and place on a baking tray. Sprinkle cheese over cutsides of bread. Bake for 6 minutes or until cheese melts.
Prepare salad kit according to packet instructions.
Fill rolls with a little salad and meatballs. Serve meatball subs with remaining salad.
